MemoryInfobox.description: 'After Phidias's murder, Kassandra set off to solve the clues he had her find. It was her hope that completing the puzzle would avenge her lost friend.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey – The Lost Tales of Greece'

General_Description: '''Journey's End''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra sought to avenge Phidias' death and help him solve the puzzle.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra inspected Phidias' body and recovered the scytale.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Here it is, the ''{{Wiki|scytale}}''! Now I can decode the messages. I will avenge you, Phidias. Rest assured of that.''
With the ''scytale'', Kassandra pieced together the symbols she copied and read the location of a secret room.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The ''scytale'' message told me to find a secret room in the [[Ancient Stronghold|stronghold]] in [[Lemnos]]... So that's where I should go.''
[[File:ACOD Journey's End 2.png|thumb|250px|Kassandra at the entrance to the room]]
Kassandra departed Elis and headed to the [[Hephaistos Islands]]. Upon arriving, she made her away to the stronghold. After eradicating every [[Cult of Kosmos]] [[soldier]], Kassandra went up to the command room, killed the general, and found a hallway with eight protuberances on the walls facing each other, each one using the banner emblems of the regions of Greece except for a trident. At the end of the room was a door. She approached one of the push switches.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Maybe if I press here...''
She pressed the switches in sequence according to the decrypted message from the scytale, and the door unlocked. She went inside the room.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Someone went to a lot of trouble to hide this.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra decrypted the message then sailed to the provided coordinates, avenging Phidias' death and recovering a powerful weapon, the [[Atlantean Blade]].
